entity.label: Account name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of Account name should be between 1 and 50
Account name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.

entity.label: Username
entity.help: Enter the username for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of username should be between 1 and 200

entity.label: Password
entity.help: Enter the password for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of password should be between 1 and 8192

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds.

validators.errorMsg: Interval must be an integer.
Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.
Max length of text input is 8192
